item.title: Leveraging Data to Understand the Pulse of Amazonia
item.description: The vastness and complexity of Amazonia present distinct challenges for both development and conservation efforts. The AmazoniaForever360+ platform, currently under development by the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB), aims to support global and regional stakeholders by providing a comprehensive array of geospatial intelligence and territorial insights about the region.

item.title: Understanding people mobility in Amazonia
item.description: Amazonia has many small and remote communities but also some big and influential urban centers. At the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB), in our efforts towards a sustainable development in Amazonia through the Amazonia Forever program, we leveraged movement data from Meta to shed light on the relationships between cities in each country within Amazonia, as well as the connection between the region’s urban areas and other parts of the countries as we understand that there is a constant movement of people and merchandise between areas.
